title: My 6 months old baby getting serious cough and cold often even after immunization doctor use to give some medication and again it will be...
description: Answer (1 of 7): What could be causing my baby's cough? There are lots of possible culprits, and in some cases you'll want to alert your child's doctor. Here are some of the most common causes of a cough: #1 The common cold If your child has a cold, he may have a runny or stuffy nose, sneezing,...
